pages._comment4: iPhone: For each page you can set a request timeout (in seconds) and specify if you want a more compact view

controls._comment5: There are 5 sizeTypes namely small, medium, large, verySmall and smallVertical. Corresponding buttons and commands must exist.
controls._comment6: You may specify a unique id for a command. This way it is callable from other apps, i.e. icontrol://execute?uniqueCmdId1L - if you do not want that, remove its corresponding key
